info.name: tumblr - Rosa Maxima - Rose Floral
info.description: NOTE: As of 01.01.2013 this style will no longer be supported. Not just another pretty background. Check out the additional features!
info.additionalInfo:
03-08-2012 - Revisions to accommodate new tumblr dashboard changes.
04-16-2012 - Updated for new Answer form box.
05-31-2012 - Updated right column to remove tumblr's new blue gradient and right column background changes.
07-15-2012 - Updated post controls (like, reblog, etc) to accommodate new tumblr dashboard changes.
12-04-2102 - Fixed "Following" head, following tracked plus '+' sign, tags icons, and added 'Settings' page.
